name: Voidpool
description: The Voidpool is a large ooze creature embodying a dark, formless essence tied to the Void.
memorable: Its ability to transport creatures to the Void creates a unique and terrifying threat in combat.
goals: To capture and transport opponents to the Void.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other oozes or dark creatures tied to the Void.
environment: Typically found in dark, forsaken locations or areas connected to the Void.
strengths: Formidable grappling power and substantial hit points.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to radiant damage and low intelligence limits strategic capabilities.
attacks: Uses pseudopod attacks dealing bludgeoning and necrotic damage, capable of grappling foes.
most_powerful_ability: Planar Portal allows it to potentially transport grappled creatures to the Void.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings in complete darkness.
skills: Low passive perception of 8 indicates limited awareness of its environment.
additional_information: Amorphous allows it to slip through narrow spaces.
Grappler ability enhances its effectiveness in combat.
Immunities to force and necrotic damage increase its resilience.
Condition immunities make it a difficult foe to hinder.
Can climb difficult surfaces without difficulty.
test_queries: dark ooze that transports creatures to the Void
large formless creature with necrotic attacks
monster that grapples and pulls into the Void
ooze with portal abilities and grappling strength
creature immune to force and necrotic damage
